Uses of Interface
com.samskivert.depot.CacheInvalidator

  • Packages that use CacheInvalidator 
    Package Description
    com.samskivert.depot
    The bulk of the Depot public API.

    • Uses of CacheInvalidator in com.samskivert.depot

      Subinterfaces of CacheInvalidator in com.samskivert.depot 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ValidatingCacheInvalidator
      An augmented cache invalidator interface for invalidators that can ensure that they are operating on the proper persistent record class.
      Classes in com.samskivert.depot that implement CacheInvalidator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CacheInvalidator.TraverseWithFilter<T extends Serializable> 
      class  Key<T extends PersistentRecord>
      A special form of WhereClause that uniquely specifies a single database row and thus also a single persistent object.
      class  KeySet<T extends PersistentRecord>
      Contains a set of primary keys that match a set of persistent records.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Deletes the records that match the configured query clauses.
